Stop-loss strategy: Trailing stop loss with 8% threshold, or if the stock price falls below 12.96 NTD
Trailing stop loss with a 10% threshold, triggered when the stock price falls below the 50-day moving average or if the company reports a significant decline in quarterly earnings.
Trailing stop loss with 10% threshold, sell if price falls below 12.96 NTD or if ROE falls below 5% for two consecutive quarters.
Set stop loss at 12.96 NTD (10% below the current price) and adjust the stop loss to break-even point when the stock price reaches 16.5 NTD.
